attributes.action: not permit any levy or stealth tax to pay for broadband to every home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Broadband for all! if people want it then let them pay for it themselves! 2Mb by 2012 will be painfully slow, a waste of time and unlikely to be wanted by anyone in their right mind. Why should people pay this TAX when out of their own pocket they already have a faster connection? Let the people decide what they want to spend their hard earned money, no this useless government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
